Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Beijing Yunji Technology Co., Ltd. (referred to as "Yunji Technology") was founded in 2014 with the mission of "Robots, for a Happier Humanity," and is committed to building a world-leading ecosystem for service intelligent agents. By deeply serving enterprise clients, Yunji Technology redefines consumer experiences through cutting-edge robotics and intelligent agent services. From robots capable of interacting with the physical world to intelligent software platforms that streamline decision-making, Yunji Technology leverages intelligent agents to deliver adaptive, scalable, consumer-centric, and future-ready products and services, establishing itself as a pioneer in the R&D and commercialization of robotic service agents.

 

To date, the company has deployed its solutions in over 30,000 global scenarios, including hotels, hospitals, factories, apartments, and office buildings, covering regions such as the Middle East, the Americas, South Korea, Japan, and Thailand. In 2024 alone, its robotic intelligent agents completed over 500 million service tasks and traveled 20.33 million kilometers—equivalent to circling the Earth’s equator approximately 507 times.
 

In 2023, Yunji Technology pioneered a new form of embodied intelligent robotics—the Composite Polymorphic Robot [UP]. As a multi-functional robot capable of using tools, understanding and assigning tasks, and collaborating in groups, it was recognized as one of the first "Comprehensive 5G Application Solution Providers" by the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology (MIIT) for its integration of "robotics + 5G technology."
 

Yunji Technology has been successively awarded the titles of "Specialized, Refined, Distinctive, and Innovative" (Little Giant) Enterprise by the MIIT and the Beijing Municipal Government. It has also twice received China’s prestigious AI accolade, the "Wu Wenjun Artificial Intelligence Award," and has participated in drafting 26 technical and industry standards, solidifying its leadership in technological innovation and application within the industry.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Enterprise operational data
Development data
Research case records related to robotics
Promotional video data
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
1.We mainly use packaging tools such as CAR files to uniformly package the data, which facilitates our data transmission process.
2.For online data transmission, we will use methods supported by the HTTP protocol.
3.Based on suggestions from our SPs, we may also adopt tools like Boost or Curio for data onboarding.
